Package gabrielLopes.project2425.DevPackage.QuickFixApp.ServerInterfacePackage

Class ApiManager

java.lang.Object
gabrielLopes.project2425.DevPackage.QuickFixApp.ServerInterfacePackage.ApiManager
public class ApiManager extends Object
Central helper for calling all QuickFix API endpoints using Retrofit. Handles authentication, Retrofit setup, and API execution.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static interface 
    ApiManager.LoginCallback
    Callback for login responses.
    static interface 
    ApiManager.ProfileCallback
    Callback used when retrieving the current user's profile.
    static interface 
    ApiManager.ProfilePictureCallback
    Callback used when retrieving or uploading a profile picture.
    static interface 
    ApiManager.ProviderRoleCallback
    Callback for actions like adding or updating a provider role.
    static interface 
    ApiManager.RequestCallback
    Callback for fetching details about a single service request.
    static interface 
    ApiManager.RequestCreatorCallback
    Callback for checking if the current user is the creator of a request.
    static interface 
    ApiManager.RequestsListCallback
    Callback for retrieving a filtered list of service requests.
    static interface 
    ApiManager.ServiceCallback
    Callback for retrieving detailed data about a service.
    static interface 
    ApiManager.ServiceListCallback
    Callback for retrieving a list of services owned by the provider or requested by the client.
    static interface 
    ApiManager.ServiceProviderCallback
    Callback for getting full details about a specific service provider role.
    static interface 
    ApiManager.ServiceProviderRolesCallback
    Callback for retrieving all roles created by the current provider.
    static interface 
    ApiManager.ServiceProvidersListCallback
    Callback for getting a filtered list of service providers.
    static interface 
    ApiManager.UserActionCallback
    Generic callback for user account actions like register or delete.
    static interface 
    ApiManager.UserProfileUpdateCallback
    Callback for updating user profile information.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public static void initialize(android.content.Context context)
      Initializes the API manager with application context. Needed to access SharedPreferences.
      Parameters:
      context - Application context used to access SharedPreferences.

    • getAuthToken

      public static String getAuthToken()
      Retrieves the saved JWT token for authenticated requests.

    • getApiService

      public static ApiInterface getApiService()
      Returns a Retrofit instance of the API interface. Initializes it if not already created.

    • login

      public static void login(String username, String password, ApiManager.LoginCallback callback)
      Logs in the user with the given credentials. On success, saves token and user ID, then triggers callback. * @param username User's username. * @param password User's password. * @param callback Callback with success or failure.

    • getUser

      public static void getUser(ApiManager.ProfileCallback callback)
      Retrieves the current user's profile info using their token.
      Parameters:
      callback - Callback with the profile data or error.

    • getClientInfo

      public static void getClientInfo(int userId, ApiManager.ProfileCallback callback)
      Gets another user's profile by their user ID. Used in the context of a service provider knowing a request's creator
      Parameters:
      userId - ID of the user to retrieve.
      callback - Callback with the profile or error.

    • addUser

      public static void addUser(ApiModels.addUserRequest request, ApiManager.UserActionCallback callback)
      Sends a request to create a new user account.
      Parameters:
      request - User registration data.
      callback - Callback for success or failure.

    • updateUser

      public static void updateUser(ApiModels.UpdateUserRequest request, ApiManager.UserProfileUpdateCallback callback)
      Updates the profile of the current user.
      Parameters:
      request - user profile new data.
      callback - Callback with result.

    • removeUserAccount

      public static void removeUserAccount(ApiManager.UserActionCallback callback)
      Removes current's user account.
      Parameters:
      callback - Callback with result.

    • getProfilePicture

      public static void getProfilePicture(int userId, ApiManager.ProfilePictureCallback callback)
      Retrieves the profile picture of the specified user.
      Parameters:
      userId - ID of the user.
      callback - Callback with image URL or error.

    • uploadProfilePicture

      public static void uploadProfilePicture(File imageFile, ApiManager.ProfilePictureCallback callback)
      Uploads a profile picture for the current user.
      Parameters:
      imageFile - The image file to upload.
      callback - Callback with upload result.

    • getServiceProviders

      public static void getServiceProviders(String serviceType, int maxBudget, String query, int maxDistance, ApiManager.ServiceProvidersListCallback callback)
      Returns a list of providers filtered by role, budget, text query, and distance.
      Parameters:
      serviceType - Type of service.
      maxBudget - Maximum budget allowed.
      query - Text query to filter names or descriptions.
      maxDistance - Max distance in kilometers.
      callback - Callback with list or error.

    • getServiceProviderById

      public static void getServiceProviderById(int providerId, String roleName, ApiManager.ServiceProviderCallback callback)
      Gets full details for a specific provider's role
      Parameters:
      providerId - ID of the provider.
      roleName - Name of the role.
      callback - Callback with provider details or error.

    • getProviderRoles

      Retrieves all current's user provider roles.
      Parameters:
      callback - Callback with list of roles.

      Parameters:

      callback - Callback with result.

    • getRequests

      public static void getRequests(String spinner, int budget, String query, int maxDistance, ApiManager.RequestsListCallback callback)
      Retrieves all public service requests filtered by type, budget, query, and distance.
      Parameters:
      spinner - Service type filter.
      budget - Max price.
      query - Text query.
      maxDistance - Distance in km.
      callback - Callback with list or error.

    • getClientRequests

      public static void getClientRequests(String status, String query, double maxBudget, ApiManager.RequestsListCallback callback)
      Gets requests created by the current user.
      Parameters:
      status - Status filter.
      query - Text query.
      maxBudget - Budget limit.
      callback - Callback with result list.

    • getRequestById

      public static void getRequestById(int requestId, ApiManager.RequestCallback callback)
      Gets the details of a specific request by ID.
      Parameters:
      requestId - ID of the request.
      callback - Callback with request details.

    • addRequest

      public static void addRequest(ApiModels.ServiceRequestRequest request, ApiManager.UserActionCallback callback)
      Adds a new request.
      Parameters:
      request - The request data.
      callback - Callback with result of creation.

    • updateRequest

      public static void updateRequest(int requestId, ApiModels.ServiceRequestRequest request, ApiManager.UserActionCallback callback)
      Updates an existing request by its ID.
      Parameters:
      requestId - ID of the request.
      request - Updated request fields.
      callback - Callback with update result.

    • removeRequest

      public static void removeRequest(int requestId, ApiManager.UserActionCallback callback)
      Removes a request by ID.
      Parameters:
      requestId - ID of the request.
      callback - Callback with result.

    • handleRequestDecision

      public static void handleRequestDecision(int requestId, boolean accept, ApiManager.UserActionCallback callback)
      Accepts or rejects a pending request by the provider.
      Parameters:
      requestId - ID of the request.
      accept - Whether to accept (true) or reject (false).
      callback - Callback with decision result.

    • isRequestCreator

      public static void isRequestCreator(int requestId, ApiManager.RequestCreatorCallback callback)
      Checks if the current user is the creator of a given request.
      Parameters:
      requestId - ID of the request.
      callback - Callback returning true if owner, false otherwise.

    • updateServiceStatus

      public static void updateServiceStatus(int serviceId, String newStatus, ApiManager.UserActionCallback callback)
      Updates the status of an active service.
      Parameters:
      serviceId - ID of the service.
      newStatus - New status to set.
      callback - Callback with result.

    • getServiceById

      public static void getServiceById(int serviceId, ApiManager.ServiceCallback callback)
      Gets a service by its ID.
      Parameters:
      serviceId - ID of the service.
      callback - Callback with service data.

    • getServicesByProvider

      public static void getServicesByProvider(int providerId, String status, String query, double minBudget, ApiManager.ServiceListCallback callback)
      Retrieves all services handled by the specified provider.
      Parameters:
      providerId - ID of the provider.
      status - Status filter.
      query - Search query.
      minBudget - Minimum price.
      callback - Callback with list of services.

    • getErrorMessage

      private static String getErrorMessage(retrofit2.Response<?> response)
      Extracts a human-readable error message from a failed Retrofit response. Used across all callbacks to get API error messages.
      Parameters:
      response - The failed Retrofit response.
      Returns:
      The extracted error message, or a default one if parsing fails.

    • getStringObjectMap

      @NonNull private static Map<String,Object> getStringObjectMap(ApiModels.ServiceRequestRequest request)
      Converts a ServiceRequestRequest object into a map of non-null fields for partial update. Used in PATCH requests to update only changed fields.
      Parameters:
      request - The service request data to be transformed.
      Returns:
      Map with field names and values to send in the update body.
